DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether Smecta® is more effective than placebo with respect to time to recovery following an acute diarrhoea episode.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Smecta® vs Placebo on the Time to Recovery Following an Acute Diarrhoea Episode in Adults
DOC.criteria: Acute diarrhoea episode defined as at least 3 watery stools per day for 48 hours or less Patient with, usually, normal bowel habits, i.e. at least 3 stools per week and no more than 3 stools per day Gross blood, pus in the stools Fever >39ºC Other episode of acute watery diarrhoea within the last 30 days History of chronic diarrhoea or motor diarrhoea
